overview: Natalie, an ultrasound tech with a history of not finishing things, is inspired by a cancer patient to sign up for a Triathlon. Natalie is introduced to the strange (and aerodynamic) world of triathletes and meets a colorful cast of characters as she trains for the Nationâ€™s Triathlon. With the support of her new teammates, she digs deep to discover just how far she can push her mind and body.
title: TRI
